Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should character creation process be 
revised to offer a better idea of the 
capabilities of the character? 

  o No, it is good as it is. 
  o Yes, but there should be only slight guidances to it. 
  o Yes, it should be more complete. 
  o I don't give a damn. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=967833  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
